SEARCH
Package model

Class User

java.lang.Object
model.BaseEntity
model.User
All Implemented Interfaces:
Entity
Direct Known Subclasses:
Administrator, Doctor, Nurse, Patient, Pharmacist
public abstract class User extends BaseEntity
The User class serves as an abstract base class for user entities in the system. It includes common attributes such as password, salt, name, age, and gender, and provides utility methods for password validation and management.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Celeste Ho

  • Constructor Details

    • User

      public User(String id, String password, byte[] salt, String name, int age, Gender gender)
      Constructs a User object with the specified ID, password, salt, name, age, and gender.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier for the user.
      password - The hashed password of the user.
      salt - The salt used for hashing the password.
      name - The name of the user.
      age - The age of the user.
      gender - The gender of the user.

    • User

      public User(String id, String password, byte[] salt, String name, int age, Gender gender, LocalDateTime createdAt, LocalDateTime updatedAt)
      Constructs a User object with the specified ID, password, salt, name, age, gender, creation timestamp, and update timestamp.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier for the user.
      password - The hashed password of the user.
      salt - The salt used for hashing the password.
      name - The name of the user.
      age - The age of the user.
      gender - The gender of the user.
      createdAt - The creation timestamp for the user.
      updatedAt - The last update timestamp for the user.

    • validatePassword

      public boolean validatePassword(String password)
      Validates the provided password against the stored hashed password and salt.
      Parameters:
      password - The plain-text password to validate.
      Returns:
      true if the password matches, false otherwise.

    • setPassword

      public void setPassword(String password) throws Exception
      Sets a new password for the user, hashing it and generating a new salt.
      Parameters:
      password - The new plain-text password for the user.
      Throws:
      Exception - If hashing or salt generation fails.

    • setAge

      public void setAge(int age)
      Sets the age of the user.
      Parameters:
      age - The new age for the user.

      Returns a CSV representation of the user, including password and salt.

      Specified by:
